1.title: Queen of the Fairies

episode of.title: The Adventures of Napkin Man! (TV Series 2013–2017)

1.plot: It's silly sports day. Lucy, who is dressed like a fairy, doesn't want to try any of the silly sports because she's unfamiliar with them and says "no" whenever Mr. Anthony asks her if she want to try this one or that one. Her fear is making her feel all crunchy and tight inside. To make her feel less crunchy, Mr. Anthony shows her how to do the "no" shake to shake all the no's inside of her out. It helps make her feel less crunchy, but doesn't make her any less afraid to try the sports. So Mr. Anthony tells Lucy a Napkin Man story, about the time he helped a little ...

2.title: Familysaurus

episode of.title: The Adventures of Napkin Man! (TV Series 2013–2017)

2.plot: The students are making family collages, in which they are to highlight an activity their family partook. Sam doesn't understand Michelle's collage. It's not the pictures of the dinosaurs, which are to signify her family's recent trip to the dinosaur museum, that he doesn't get, but that the photo she inserts in the middle of the collage solely has her with two adult men, who Mr. Anthony explains are Michelle's two dads. Sam's feeling of confusion is making him feel like he has rocks in his head. Mr. Anthony shows Sam how to do the dinosaur snore to help get those ...

3.title: The New Classmate Pt. 1

episode of.title: The Adventures of Napkin Man! (TV Series 2013–2017)

3.plot: Mr. Anthony tells the class that a new student named Layla will be joining them tomorrow, and that Layla doesn't speak any English yet, but rather speaks Arabic. An excited Lucy volunteers to show Layla around the classroom when she arrives. While the other students make welcome crafts for Layla, Lucy can't help but leap around like a lemur from one spot in the classroom to another in demonstrating what she will show Layla when she arrives. Lucy's excitement makes her feel like she has bubbles inside of her. Mr. Anthony shows Lucy how to do the bubble float to get rid...

episode of.title: The Adventures of Napkin Man! (TV Series 2013–2017)

Sage, who has painted a figure skater on hers, figure skating being her favorite thing to watch, is in a quandary: should she leave her birdhouse at her mother's house or her father's house, her parents who do not live together. Her anxiousness is making her feel wiggly and itchy inside. To make her feel less wiggly and itchy, Mr. Anthony shows her how to do the figure skater twirl. episode of.title: The Adventures of Napkin Man! (TV Series 2013–2017)

He believes it's the perfect present and wants to give Zahara a perfect present in return, but he doesn't know what to give her, which, in his anxiousness, is making him feel all jittery inside and making his forehead feel all scrunchy. To help him be less scrunchy, Mr. Anthony shows Liam how to do the eyebrow hop, which helps but still doesn't fix the problem that he doesn't know what to give Zahara. So Mr. Anthony tells Liam about the ...

8.title: Get Well Soon

episode of.title: The Adventures of Napkin Man! (TV Series 2013–2017)

8.plot: May-Ling's tummy isn't feeling very good, her mother who has come to take her home. Empathetic Amelia, May-Ling's best friend, started feeling sad when she knew that May-Ling was feeling sad, she as a result having the sad sniffles. To get rid of the sad sniffles, Mr. Anthony shows Amelia how to do the happy tap, which helps, but still doesn't stop Amelia from feeling sad about May-Ling. So Mr. Anthony tells Amelia about the time Napkin Man helped Olive, an astronaut girl, when she felt sad about her best friend and fellow astronaut, Astrid, getting space sick from ...

9.title: New Shoes

episode of.title: The Adventures of Napkin Man! (TV Series 2013–2017)

9.plot: Mr. Anthony has asked his twin brother, Mr. Newman, to teach the class for him. Two problems arise with Mr. Newman's appearance: he shows up a day early; and Mr. Newman notices that Mr. Anthony, this day early, is wearing Mr. Newman's new pair of yellow shoes without asking. In their anger, both Mr. Anthony and Mr. Newman are feeling all hot and tight. Amelia reminds Mr. Anthony that they can do the twirl-a-whirl to feel less hot and tight, which helps, but doesn't fix the issues that Mr. Newman has arrived a day early and Mr. Anthony is wearing Mr. Newman's shoes ...

10.title: Not My Mess

episode of.title: The Adventures of Napkin Man! (TV Series 2013–2017)

10.plot: The class has just finished their play fun fair and it's time to clean up before they move onto their next activity. Ahmet, who already cleaned up his area, doesn't think it's fair that he needs to help clean up everyone else's mess he didn't make, which is making his face feel scrunchy. To unscrunch Ahmet's face, Mr. Anthony shows him how to do the rubber face stretch, which helps but doesn't change the fact that Mr. Anthony wants everyone to help clean up everything. So Mr. Anthony tells Ahmet about the time Napkin Man helped his friend Timmy, the Mayor of Tidytown,...

11.title: Pink Elephant

episode of.title: The Adventures of Napkin Man! (TV Series 2013–2017)

11.plot: The students are drawing animals in art class, Ethan who is feeling exasperated as Zahara won't listen to him about her pink polka-dot elephant which he feels should be gray and solid colored like real elephants. His exasperation is making his face feel all scrunchy like it's on too tight. To help Ethan feel less scrunchy, Mr. Anthony shows him how to do the crocodile smile, which does make him feel less scrunchy, but doesn't change the fact about how he feels about the inaccuracies of Zahara's drawing. So Mr. Anthony tells Ethan about the time Napkin Man helped his ...

12.title: Snuggle Bunny

episode of.title: The Adventures of Napkin Man! (TV Series 2013–2017)

12.plot: Mr. Anthony is performing a magic act with Amelia as his assistant, she who presents the transformed stuffed bunny in the magic top hat into the real live bunny in the cage. The real bunny is Amelia's from home, she who often snuggles with it. Annoyed that bunny doesn't want to snuggle with her in front of the class, Amelia feels all "grrr" and grumbly. To help her get rid of the grrr grumblies, Mr. Anthony shows Amelia how to do the happy hop, which helps but still doesn't change the fact that bunny doesn't want to snuggle. So Mr. Anthony tells her the time Napkin ...

13.title: Special Soapstone

episode of.title: The Adventures of Napkin Man! (TV Series 2013–2017)

13.plot: Liam's Uncle Chris has brought him to school today, as his usual guardian to school, his single Mom, is out of town business. One of the class assignments today is to make Father's Day presents, the day this upcoming Sunday. But Liam isn't yet participating in the assignment as he doesn't have a Dad anymore, his head feeling all fuzzy inside in his confusion. To get Liam to feel less fuzzy, Mr. Anthony shows him how to do the polar bear shampoo, which helps but still doesn't alleviate his confusion about whether he should participate in the assignment. So Mr. Anthony ...

14.title: Days of Thunder

episode of.title: The Adventures of Napkin Man! (TV Series 2013–2017)

14.plot: Mr. Anthony postpones the class field trip to collect leaves as it's raining and thundering outside. Although they are safe and dry inside, many of the students are scared of the thunder, Ahmet whose heart is beating fast, and Chloe whose tummy is all tight. To relieve their physical symptoms, Mr. Anthony shows them how to do the tree top toe touch, which helps but doesn't make them any less scared of the thunder. So Mr. Anthony tells them about the time Napkin Man helped his squirrel friends Larry, Barry and Sherry who were scared of the loud noise and flashing ...

15.title: Fun for One

episode of.title: The Adventures of Napkin Man! (TV Series 2013–2017)

15.plot: Liam is feeling all small and shlumpy in his loneliness as all the other kids have someone else to play with, whereas he is all by himself. Mr. Anthony shows him how to do the super hero stretch to make him feel less small and shlumpy, but it doesn't change the fact that he is all alone with no one to play with. So Mr. Anthony tells him about the time Napkin Man visited Super Fun Land and managed to have fun while his super hero friends were busy having fun with each other playing games in which he couldn't participate at that time.

16.title: Bye Bye Boogaloo

episode of.title: The Adventures of Napkin Man! (TV Series 2013–2017)

16.plot: The class' pet hamster, Boogaloo, has passed away. While Mr. Anthony and most of the students are sad, some of the students have other feelings in addition, from being mad to being lonely. Mr. Anthony wants the children to express their emotions honestly. To deal with the actual death of Boogaloo, Mr. Anthony tells the class a Napkin Man story about a bunch of children nicknamed the butterfly brigade who loved to take pictures of butterflies, they who in the process of their activity learned what to do about the death of a loved one when they found their favorite ...

17.title: Parrot Problems

episode of.title: The Adventures of Napkin Man! (TV Series 2013–2017)

17.plot: Mr. Anthony's students are trying on different animal masks and pretending to be those animals by making the appropriate animal sounds. By the time Mr. Anthony gets around to handing out a mask to Ethan, all what Ethan considers the exciting animals are gone, the only animal mask left being a parrot. In his disappointment, Ethan feels all tangled up inside. To get Ethan untangled, Mr. Anthony shows him how to do the untangle tickle, which helps but doesn't get rid of his disappointment. So Mr. Anthony tells him about the time Napkin Man helped a boy named Jinsong of ...

18.title: Ta-Ta Tutu

episode of.title: The Adventures of Napkin Man! (TV Series 2013–2017)

18.plot: Chloe accidentally spills juice on Talia's favorite dress. Regardless of it being an accident and Chloe being sorry, Talia is upset at Chloe for ruining her dress, her face being hot and her stomach all tight and scrunchy in the process. Mr. Anthony shows Talia how to do the funny face flex to help her feel less hot and scrunchy, but it still doesn't help in making her any less upset at Chloe. So Mr. Anthony tells her about the time Napkin Man helped his ballerina friend Betty, when she was upset with her fellow ballerina Bonnie for accidentally spilling mustard on ...

19.title: Play the Day Away

episode of.title: The Adventures of Napkin Man! (TV Series 2013–2017)

19.plot: Ahmet doesn't want his mom, who has just dropped him off at class, to leave, she needing to go to work. Just as Ahmet's stuffed monkey, Momo, clings to Ahmet's neck, Ahmet is clinging to his mom, he feeling all jittery inside in the process of not wanting her to leave. Mr. Anthony shows Ahmet how to do the monkey dance to shake off the jitters and feel less clingy, but that still doesn't stop him from not wanting his mom to go. So Mr. Anthony tells Ahmet and his mom about the time Napkin Man helped his tree-house residing friend Semu, who didn't want his mom to go ...

20.title: Toppled Totem Pole

episode of.title: The Adventures of Napkin Man! (TV Series 2013–2017)

20.plot: Mr. Anthony and the students are pretending to be Coast Salish peoples. Amelia is feeling insecure since she can't make her totem pole look as good as Zahara's and as it looks like in the photograph, in the process she feeling small and no good. Mr. Anthony shows Amelia how to do the growly bear stretch, which does make her feel better, but she still doesn't want to finish her totem pole if it can't look as good as Zahara's. So Mr. Anthony proceeds to tell Amelia about the time Napkin Man helped Raven, a Coast Salish girl, when she felt her totem pole, which she ...

imdb.plot outline: Mr. Anthony is a sympathetic preschool teacher. His students often come to him with their problems, most dealing with difficult emotional issues they are facing and at their age do not quite understand. Mr. Anthony helps them overcome their emotions using his alter-ego, Napkin Man, a cartoon character he draws on a napkin and who comes to life as Mr. Anthony tells how Napkin Man has dealt with the issue before in helping another young person in distress.
imdb.title: The Adventures of Napkin Man!
plot: A teacher, Mr. Anthony, teaches his students how to deal with various emotions appropriately. Mr. Anthony helps his students learn about emotions with stories about a superhero, Napkin Man, drawn on a napkin.::aislyn79

Mr. Anthony is a sympathetic preschool teacher. His students often come to him with their problems, most dealing with difficult emotional issues they are facing and at their age do not quite understand. Mr. Anthony helps them overcome their emotions using his alter-ego, Napkin Man, a cartoon character he draws on a napkin and who comes to life as Mr. Anthony tells how Napkin Man has dealt with the issue before in helping another young person in distress.::Huggo
